qul ūḥiya ilayya annahu is'tamaʿa nafarun mina al-jini faqālū innā samiʿ'nā qur'ānan ʿajaban
yahdī ilā al-rush'di faāmannā bihi walan nush'rika birabbinā aḥadan
wa-annahu taʿālā jaddu rabbinā mā ittakhadha ṣāḥibatan walā waladan
wa-annahu kāna yaqūlu safīhunā ʿalā al-lahi shaṭaṭan
wa-annā ẓanannā an lan taqūla al-insu wal-jinu ʿalā al-lahi kadhiban
wa-annahu kāna rijālun mina al-insi yaʿūdhūna birijālin mina al-jini fazādūhum rahaqan
wa-annahum ẓannū kamā ẓanantum an lan yabʿatha al-lahu aḥadan
wa-annā lamasnā al-samāa fawajadnāhā muli-at ḥarasan shadīdan washuhuban
wa-annā kunnā naqʿudu min'hā maqāʿida lilssamʿi faman yastamiʿi al-āna yajid lahu shihāban raṣadan
wa-annā lā nadrī asharrun urīda biman fī al-arḍi am arāda bihim rabbuhum rashadan
wa-annā minnā al-ṣāliḥūna waminnā dūna dhālika kunnā ṭarāiqa qidadan
wa-annā ẓanannā an lan nuʿ'jiza al-laha fī al-arḍi walan nuʿ'jizahu haraban
wa-annā lammā samiʿ'nā al-hudā āmannā bihi faman yu'min birabbihi falā yakhāfu bakhsan walā rahaqan
wa-annā minnā al-mus'limūna waminnā al-qāsiṭūna faman aslama fa-ulāika taḥarraw rashadan
wa-ammā al-qāsiṭūna fakānū lijahannama ḥaṭaban
wa-allawi is'taqāmū ʿalā al-ṭarīqati la-asqaynāhum māan ghadaqan
linaftinahum fīhi waman yuʿ'riḍ ʿan dhik'ri rabbihi yasluk'hu ʿadhāban ṣaʿadan
wa-anna al-masājida lillahi falā tadʿū maʿa al-lahi aḥadan
wa-annahu lammā qāma ʿabdu al-lahi yadʿūhu kādū yakūnūna ʿalayhi libadan
qul innamā adʿū rabbī walā ush'riku bihi aḥadan
qul innī lā amliku lakum ḍarran walā rashadan
qul innī lan yujīranī mina al-lahi aḥadun walan ajida min dūnihi mul'taḥadan
illā balāghan mina al-lahi warisālātihi waman yaʿṣi al-laha warasūlahu fa-inna lahu nāra jahannama khālidīna fīhā abadan
ḥattā idhā ra-aw mā yūʿadūna fasayaʿlamūna man aḍʿafu nāṣiran wa-aqallu ʿadadan
qul in adrī aqarībun mā tūʿadūna am yajʿalu lahu rabbī amadan
ʿālimu al-ghaybi falā yuẓ'hiru ʿalā ghaybihi aḥadan
illā mani ir'taḍā min rasūlin fa-innahu yasluku min bayni yadayhi wamin khalfihi raṣadan
liyaʿlama an qad ablaghū risālāti rabbihim wa-aḥāṭa bimā ladayhim wa-aḥṣā kulla shayin ʿadadan
